body_html: Hmm, there's already a max_pooling1d in layers. If you make a non-layer max_pool1d, it might be good to share code with the layer. That is, you'd pull the layer code out into a separate function, and then make the layer code use the function.
body_text: Hmm, there's already a max_pooling1d in layers.  If you make a non-layer max_pool1d, it might be good to share code with the layer.  That is, you'd pull the layer code out into a separate function, and then make the layer code use the function.
body: Hmm, there's already a `max_pooling1d` in layers.  If you make a non-layer `max_pool1d`, it might be good to share code with the layer.  That is, you'd pull the layer code out into a separate function, and then make the layer code use the function.
